ED_Title: Report  of the International Residual Mechanism for Criminal Tribunals
ED_DecisionText: At its 18th plenary meeting, on 19 October 2022, the General Assembly took note of the tenth annual report of the International Residual Mechanism for Criminal Tribunals (footnote: A/77/242).
ED_Disclaimer: The final text of this decision will be contained in document A/77/49 (Vol. II) after editorial review.
